txt.en:
Mithrandir is in the besieged city, at the south-eastern area of the Second Circle.

<rgb=#00FF00>Minas Tirith is besieged! You may examine the model of the city in the Dome of the Sun to travel between states of the city.</rgb>

The city of Minas Tirith is besieged, and the forces of Mordor assault the wall.

<rgb=#FF0000>To participate in the defence, open the Epic Battles Panel and select 'The Defence of Minas Tirith' from the menu. After you successfully complete the defence, you will be returned to the location from which you entered it.</rgb>
Talk to Mithrandir in the besieged city, at the south-eastern area of the Second Circle

'The enemy forces assault the wall! Prepare to repel them, no matter the cost!'

<rgb=#FF0000>To participate in the defence, open the Epic Battles Panel and select 'The Defence of Minas Tirith' from the menu. After you successfully complete the defence, you will be returned to the location from which you entered it.</rgb>
Prince Imrahil rallies the defenders of Minas Tirith as the forces of Mordor assault the walls of the city.

'To me, soldiers of Gondor! The enemy forces assault the wall! Prepare to repel them, no matter the cost!'

<rgb=#FF0000>To participate in the defence, open the Epic Battles Panel and select 'The Defence of Minas Tirith' from the menu. After you successfully complete the defence, you will be returned to the location from which you entered it.</rgb>
Book 4, Chapter 10: The Defence of Minas Tirith
Complete 'The Defence of Minas Tirith' from the Epic Battles Panel
'The fighting is fierce, but the enemy has not yet broken our line. Stand, soldiers of Gondor! Do not give in to fear!\n\n'They must be strong. This is the hour, [placeholder]!'
